Posts.Content: Hi Funda. I had 3 X FEC and was the due to have 3 daxotel but my oncologist changed it on the day and I'm now having 12 X weekly pacitaxel. The side effect are a lot easier to cope with which is good. But I still have 7 to go and if I stuck to original programme I would be having my last one next week so really it's swings and roundabouts. I then have to have 15 radiotherapy so the end still seems a long way off. Good luck with whichever way you end up with
Posts.Title: Different chemo regime options - any advice?
